title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Amsterdam Heliport
description:
In this addon spotlight we are going to look Amsterdam Heliport which has been just released as beta version. The heliport is located in the Northern part of the Netherlands near Amsterdam. The heliport is pretty small with only a few spots for helicopters to land.

If you want to also add this airport to MSFS 2020 download it via the link below:
https://flightsim.to/download/amsterdam-heliport/20867
